description.@en: Whether it be skinning animals, cobbling, tanning or making simple accoutrements like belts and boots, I’m your person.

effect.@en: Record this Talent name by your Skill Ranks— Leatherworking. Whenever you use a Skill that could be paired with Leatherworking, ignore any penalties your character is currently suffering from due to your Peril Condition Track. You also gain a +10% Base Chance to use the Skill when paired.
